subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Al Horford scored 23 points and the Atlanta Hawks recovered after squandering a 21-point lead to beat the 76ers and stretch their franchise-record winning streak to 19 games.
snippet: Al Horford scored 23 points and the Atlanta Hawks recovered after squandering a 21-point lead to beat the 76ers and stretch their franchise-record winning streak to 19 games.
